Title: Fire
Plot: An old Oxford girlfriend of Mulder's asks for his help on an international case concerning the unexplainable execution of several British dignitaries, and they encounter an assassin who can produce fire from his bare hands.
GuestStars: Amanda Pays, Mark Sheppard, Dan Lett, Duncan Fraser, Lynda Boyd, Phil Hayes, Christopher Gray, Keegan MacIntosh, Alan Robertson, Laurie Paton
